vocabularies.example: Which month does your school year start in? It starts in January.
What's the eighth month? It is August.
Travelling by car on a motorway for a long time makes us tired.,
An ambulance takes people to the hospital.
We waited on the platform for the train.
The journey was very long and difficult.,
The passenger sat on the bus.
He has a lot of luggage.

grammars.description: Diễn tả khả năng một việc gì đó có thể xảy ra trong tương lai (không chắc chắn).
grammars.example:
I think it may be snowing.
My mum said it might be cold tomorrow.

grammars.description: Đại từ bất định dùng để chỉ người, vật hoặc nơi chốn không xác định (someone, anyone, no-one, everyone, something, anything, nothing, everything, somewhere, anywhere, nowhere, everywhere).
grammars.example:
I'm hungry. Have we got anything to eat?
I can't hear anyone in the house. No, there's no-one at home.

vocabularies.example: This animal lives in the ocean. It's got eight 'arms and legs'.,
All of the deserts in Australia are huge.
An octopus lives in the ocean.
Camels are called 'ships of the desert'.
This green and brown animal is very slow. It's got a shell on its back.
A beetle is a small creature with six legs.
We went to some woods near the stream.
These animals are extinct. They lived long ago.

grammars.description: Ôn tập thì quá khứ đơn với động từ có quy tắc và bất quy tắc.
grammars.example: Last week we went on a school trip to the beach. We left after school on Friday.

grammars.description: Sử dụng 'too' (quá) và 'enough' (đủ) để mô tả tính chất hoặc số lượng.
grammars.example:
I like ice skating, but if you don't wear the right clothes it's too cold.
There isn't enough water.

vocabularies.example: People drive fast in racing cars to win a race.
Chess is a board game with a king and queen.

vocabularies.meaning: câu đố / trò chơi ghép hình
vocabularies.example: How did she finish the puzzle so quickly?
Mum loved the concert. She danced all evening.
The musician who played the drums was brilliant.
The robot isn't playing the guitar, is it? No, it's playing the violin.,
Did he win a prize for chess?

grammars.description: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành để nói về trải nghiệm (Have you ever...?).
grammars.example:
Have you ever eaten black beans?
I haven't seen the pyramids yet.,

grammars.structure: Present perfect with just, already, yet
grammars.description: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành đi kèm với 'just' (vừa mới), 'already' (đã... rồi), 'yet' (chưa).
grammars.example:
I haven't sent him the email yet.
We've just visited Frank's grandma.
I've already done my homework.

vocabularies.example: Mum's just fetched Grandma from the station.
I was tidying my room when Grandma phoned.
My dad's going to repair my bike.
He ate cereal for breakfast at quarter to ten.
At half past nine, the managers went to a big office.

grammars.description: Thì quá khứ tiếp diễn diễn tả hành động đang xảy ra tại một thời điểm trong quá khứ.
grammars.example:
While I was cleaning my bike, my sister was watching TV.
I was looking after my little brother when we saw our maths teacher.,

grammars.description: Thì hiện tại hoàn thành dùng với 'since' (mốc thời gian) và 'for' (khoảng thời gian).
grammars.example:
She's lived here for six months.
I haven't been to school since 21st June.

vocabularies.example: This is the coldest season.
There was a lot of fog. It was very foggy.
When there's a storm with a lot of wind and rain, the sea is very dangerous.
We sit on this to go down a hill fast when there's snow. It's a sledge.
We wear these on our hands to keep them warm.
This sport may sometimes be dangerous because it's fast. You go down a mountain with snow.

grammars.description: Thì tương lai đơn để đưa ra dự đoán hoặc lời hứa.
grammars.example:
I'll water their garden.
We won't talk about football.
Don't worry Mum, I'll tidy my bedroom after lunch.,

It was very hot, so I went for a swim.
I made a snowman because there was a lot of snow.

vocabularies.example: At half past nine, the managers went to a big office to have a meeting.
Helen's Uncle Robert is a mechanic.
Many journalists work with a photographer.,
Waiters work in a restaurant.
Firefighters wear a helmet as part of a uniform.
Robots make cars in a factory.

grammars.description: Câu hỏi đuôi để xác nhận thông tin.
grammars.example:
You eat everything, don't you?
You can cycle, can't you?
They aren't in Australia, are they?,

grammars.description: Câu hỏi ngắn để thể hiện sự quan tâm hoặc ngạc nhiên.
grammars.example:
'I didn't go to the bank on Friday morning.' 'Didn't you?'
'It was my twin brother.' 'Was it?'

vocabularies.example: Frank didn't paint all of the gate because there wasn't any more paint.
Betty ran in and jumped on the shelf because she was frightened.
What's shampoo used for? It's used for washing your hair.
What are combs used for? They're used for combing your hair.
She bought her camera for only 20 euros. It was really expensive (incorrect context in exercise, implies checking meaning).

grammars.description: Quá khứ phân từ của các động từ (V3/ed) (break -> broken, eat -> eaten).
grammars.example:
It was used for cooking food.
Michael's just swum 200 metres.,

grammars.description: Cấu trúc chỉ công dụng của vật: be used for + V-ing / be used to + V-inf.
grammars.example:
It was used for cooking food.
People used soap to wash their clothes.,

vocabularies.example: An astronaut travels in space.
Ivan landed his rocket on the new planet.,
Earth, Jupiter and Mars are all planets.
Enormous is another word for huge.
Spaceships will improve.

grammars.description: Phân biệt 'will' (dự đoán, quyết định tức thì) và 'going to' (kế hoạch, dự định có căn cứ).
grammars.example:
Spaceships will improve.
Are you going to watch space films?

grammars.description: Ôn tập các thì quá khứ trong ngữ cảnh kể chuyện.
grammars.example: Ivan landed his rocket on the new planet. He was turning off his engine when he heard a strange noise.

vocabularies.example: These biscuits taste like oranges and coconuts. They're delicious!
First, mix the butter and sugar in a large bowl.
Use a wooden spoon.
Then slowly add the flour and mix it all together.
Put them carefully into the oven.
This fridge is only for one food - kimchi... no milk, no cheese and no yoghurts.,

grammars.description: Động từ chỉ giác quan + like (smells like, tastes like, looks like, feels like, sounds like).
grammars.example:
It felt like dry grass.
It smelt like carrot cake.
It looked like a nest.

grammars.description: Cấu trúc 'make' khiến ai đó cảm thấy thế nào.
grammars.example:
The smell's making me hungry.
Watching bad news on TV made my dad unhappy.,
